'Oh, so this is where you live! It's a little\nold, but it's got a nice atmosphere!'%K%P
After the phone incident, I couldn't exactly get\nrid of the goddess, so I brought her home.%K%P
She stared at the old Japanese-style houses in\nfront of her in wonder.%K%P
'Hm... Tsubaki Apartments?'%K%P
Akane read the name plate aloud.%K%P
'Hey, we've got, like...the same name! What a\ncoincidence! It's fate!'%K%P
Tsubaki Apartments. That's the name of the place\nI'm staying in.%K%P
They had remodeled an old house into apartments\nand I loved its old fashioned look.%K%P
My mom's friend used to run it, but now her\nstudent daughter, an old friend, does.%K%P
To me, this place is like a second home,\nsomeplace to truly relax.%K%P
Sadly, I'm the only tenant, the only other\npeople are the landlady and her mother.%K%P
'It seems really nice. Like...it puts me at\nease.'%K%P
It looked like Akane liked it, too.%K%P
'All right, let's go inside.'%K%P
'Okay!'%K%P
I opened the door and led Akane inside.%K%P
'Welcome back! You're running late, Sho.'%K%P
When I opened the door, a girl in uniform stood\nthere with folded arms. It was like an aura was\ndrifting about her.%K%P
'Ah... Aha... Hi there, Maika.'%K%P
It was my childhood friend and current landlady,\nMaika Kunugi.%K%P
Despite her rough style, she always takes care\nof me in one way or another.%K%P
And here she was waiting for me...%K%P
'You're out awfully late. What have you been\ndoing?'%K%P
She was smiling, but her voice was not.%K%P
'Oh, well, I got a little hungry and so I\nstopped by a convenience store...'%K%P
'Hmm... Well, if you're going to go out so late,\nlet me know next time!'%K%P
'I'm responsible for your safety, y'know!'%K%P
'I tried calling, but couldn't get through...'%K%P
She'd been worrying since I, her tenant, was out\nso late...%K%P
'I'm sorry, my battery died. But thanks for\nworrying about me.'%K%P
'I-I wasn't worried! Just let me know next\ntime!'%K%P
Maika looked away angrily.%K%P
'Uh, yeah, got it.'%K%P
'Okay then, that's fine.'%K%P
'Come on, Sho, I can't get in with you standing\nthere!'%K%P
Just when I thought I was clear...%K%P
Before I could start to explain things to Maika,\nAkane stuck her head in.%K%P
She then wrapped her arms around my waist, to\nboot.%K%P
I wanted to enjoy the softness pressed against\nmy back a bit, but it wasn't the time.%K%P
'Hey, don't grab me!'%K%P
I pushed Akane away.%K%P
'Now, Sho, don't be so shy!'%K%P
Pouting a little, Akane willingly backed off.%K%P
'Uh, Sho?'%K%P
'Y-Yes!'%K%P
Maika's voice was icy with anger, and the aura\nof rage was even more apparent than before.%K%P
'Who...is this?'%K%P
Again, she was smiling, but her voice was...not.%K%P
'Um. Yeah, so...'%K%P
'So that whole going out to buy food thing was a\ncover for sneaking some girl in?'%K%P
'N-No! Akane's nothing like that to me!'%K%P
'Oh, Akane, is it? Awfully familiar with her,\nSho. You seem very close.'%K%P
Crap.%K%P
Looking at it from her eyes, yes, I was bringing\na girl home.%K%P
It was getting harder to insist it was all just\na misunderstanding.%K%P
'No, listen, there's a reasonable\nexplanation...'%K%P
'Sho! Let me in!'%K%P
Akane tried to force her way passed me,\noblivious to my situation.%K%P
'Wait, now is not the time! Just let me explain\nfirst!'%K%P
'Fine then. If you won't let me in, I've got my\nown idea!'%K%P
'Hiyaaa!'%K%P
Idea? Just as I thought this, Akane ran into me.%K%P
'Wagh!'%K%P
I managed not to fall, but somehow Akane got in\nfront of me.%K%P
'Huh?!'%K%P
'Hold on, don't read anything into this! Maika,\nI just ran into her on the street!'%K%P
'Ha... Hahaha!'%K%P
'So... So this is what you like? You're into the\ntrashy type?'%K%P
'Whaaat?! Where did that come from?'%K%P
I couldn't see her expression, but I'm sure\nMaika wasn't smiling.%K%P
'Ugh...'%K%P
'Maika?'%K%P
'Listen, you idiot, this residence forbids any\nillicit, deviant behavior!'%K%P
After that, I was able to somehow calm her down\nand explain properly.%K%P
She reluctantly listened to me and accepted the\ntruth.%K%P
'So then, you gave this collapsed goddess your\nfood and brought her home?'%K%P
Maika asked again as we walked down the hall.%K%P
Akane followed behind and marveled at the\ninterior.%K%P
'Yes, that's exactly what happened. And my\nbattery died so I couldn't call. Sorry.'%K%P
'So I guess it really is all just a big\naccident, huh?'%K%P
'I'm sorry I got so angry...'%K%P
She apologized for the one-sided fight.%K%P
'No, I shouldn't have gone out without saying\nanything. We're both in the wrong.'%K%P
'Hm, I guess so.'%K%P
'So, should I make this goddess some food?'%K%P
'Or rather, is it okay if I do?'%K%P
I understood what she meant.%K%P
She was wondering if goddesses had some special\nreligious thing with food.%K%P
'I think it's okay, she doesn't seem to mind,\nand I gave her convenience store food...'%K%P
'Yeah! That stuff was so good!'%K%P
'Got it. Since the goddess asks, I guess I'd\nbetter.'%K%P
After Maika left, looking nervous, Akane and I\nwent into the living room.%K%P
Staring at the spectacle in front of me, I was\nso  stunned that I almost forgot to eat.%K%P
'Mmm! Amazing! Everything is just so delicious!'%K%P
The dishes covering the table disappeared one by\none.%K%P
Was I dreaming?%K%P
This Akane, what kind of stomach did she have?!%K%P
'Maika, your cooking is the best! This is\njust...holy cow!'%K%P
Even as she spoke, Akane never took her eyes off\nthe food.%K%P
'Oh, I've been complimented by a goddess!'%K%P
Maika seemed surprised by this.%K%P
To be honest, though, as housemother for a few\nyears she had become a great cook.%K%P
'I'm glad you seem to like it so much!'%K%P
'I do! Your cooking really is the best!'%K%P
And as she talked, the food continued flowing\ninto her mouth.%K%P
'Oh, yeah. Just call me Akane, okay? None of\nthat goddess stuff or Ms. Tsubaki, I hate it.'%K%P
'Oh? Well, I guess that does make it easier for\nus, too.'%K%P
She was already getting used to it.%K%P
Maika's great at getting along with people.%K%P
'I don't worry about all that little stuff.\nAnyway... Any more?'%K%P
'Y-You're still hungry?!'%K%P
Maika's face looked slightly strained as she\nrefilled the bowl with rice.%K%P
'Ahhh... That was great. I'm stuffed!'%K%P
'You ate so much you should burst!'%K%P
There was a mountain of spotless plates in front\nof her.%K%P
Where did she put it all in that tiny little\nbody?%K%P
'So, anyway, what next, Akane?'%K%P
'Hmm? Oh, let me relax a bit more before\nthinking about all that.'%K%P
Akane answered in a sleepy voice.%K%P
She was sprawled out on the floor like she'd\nexhausted herself eating.%K%P
'She's so relaxed it's like she owns the place.'%K%P
'It just feels so nice here!'%K%P
Akane said, lying limp on the floor.%K%P
I was surprised at how fast she could relax in a\nstranger's home.%K%P
'So, anyway...'%K%P
The prone Akane looked sluggishly up at Maika.%K%P
'I was thinking about this at dinner, but, are\nyou Sho's girlfriend or what?'%K%P
'Huh?! Huuuuuh...?!'%K%P
Maika was struck speechless, her face turning\nbeet red.%K%P
'N-No way, no no, nuh-uh! Not a chance! Where\ndid that come from?!'%K%P
'Well, you live together, and you cook him great\nfood. Isn't that what humans call a girlfriend?'%K%P
'W-Well, some people are like that, but not us!\nSho is just my tenant, I'm his landlady!'%K%P
'Hmm... You're being so insistent, it's kind of\nsuspicious...'%K%P
'There's nothing suspicious! You're mistaken!'%K%P
'That's right, we're just old friends. It's not\nlike you think at all.'%K%P
'...You don't have to be so blunt about it.\nStupid Sho.'%K%P
'Yeah, you two are a definitely a thing...'%K%P
'Gah!! I-I'm going to wash the dishes!'%K%P
Maika stood up like she wanted to escape,and\nstarted washing dishes with her back to us.%K%P
